traits.name: Martial Advantage
traits.desc: Once per turn, you can deal an additional 6 damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack if it is within 5 ft. of an ally that isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Paragon Power
traits.desc:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain your reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Repeat a saving throw against an ongoing effect. You have advantage on the roll.

traits.name: Raise Shield
traits.desc: You gain +2 AC until the start of your next turn.

traits.name: Slash
traits.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d10 + 1) slashing damage.
